messages.subject: Cincinnati gaming sources-- Finding friends (Gaming, HP etc...)
messages.msgSnippet: I found these by google.com entering cincinnati gaming ccg So others who want to find similar for other towns can just change the town name. Then I would open
messages.messageBody:
I found these by google.com
entering
cincinnati gaming ccg

So others who want to find similar for other towns can just change the town
name.

Then I would open a likely site and search for the city name.

This wasn't everything, but it's a start!

Comic Book World
Florence, KY * Cincinnati, OH * Louisville, KY
Email: info@...

They have a list you can subscribe to, and a website:
http://www.comicbookworld.com/gaming.htm


Acme Games Cincinnati OH USA Oct 12th 5pm Please Call For Information
(found that on a list of places having Warlord release dates, you could find
them in the phone book maybe)

Comic Central
8190B Beechmont Avenue, Cincinnati, Ohio, 45255 United States of America
Tel: 513-474-7700 Fax: 513-947-8674
http://www.ccgcentral.com/directions.asp
(directions to the store are on the site)

I think these are just clubs, but the people might know lots you need to know!
Cincinnati Adventure Gamers
Contact: Myron Leich, President
68 Kelly Drive
Florence, KY 41042
E-mail: lonnie@... (Lonnie Barnett, Treasurer)(7.95)
Cons; Fallcon

Gamer's Guild
Contact: David S Adamson
728 Cascade Rd.
Cincinnati, OH 45240
(xxx) 851-4569
E-mail: Ilumnati23@...
Meetings: Weekends, whenever, wherever we can
Interests: GURPS (pick a genre, any genre), INWO, maybye Shadowrun if
we find someone who plays it
Notes: Anyone's welcome, but all current members are in high school
Area: Cincinnati area, more specifically Forest Park-Greenhills

----------

Convention to look for:
Octocon - A slower-paced 'relaxacon', held in Cincinnati in October. Run by
the Cincinnati Fantasy Group. http://www.cfg.org/octocon/ (last year's
info, but links!)

------------------



Ral Partha Publishing Gaming Minatures info@... 5938 Carthage
Court, Cincinnati, OH 45212-1197
513-631-735 voice
